content: with the sl sts one slip_stitch in each b and one slip_stitch for every 2 f video sew the lining if desired to do this measure the width and depth of the inside of the bag according to these measurements sew the lining and sew it to the inner part of the bag 24cm 9 ½ 26cm 20 5cm 10 ¾ 8 m m 4 c 0 fold m c ½ c 2 2 ¾ 8 21 2 3 2 1 2 5cm 2 5cm 1 1 pocket side cut 2 cut 2 optional © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 28 fold the pocket in half right sides together and sew around the open edges leaving a gap of about 3 inches at the bottom middle for turning before turning press your pocket and pay attention to press back the seam allowances over the opened area this will help later on clip the corners close to the stitching now turn the pocket push out the corners neatly and then press again pin the pocket in place where you want it on your lining and stitch carefully on the sides and bottom closing the gap as you sew flip the pocket right-side out and sew on the lining pin the lining right sides together and sew straight ½ seams along the sides and bottom of piece leave the top and two snipped corners unsewn press seams open pinch together gaps in snipped corners lining up the side and bottom seams in the center pin straight across and sew a 1/2 seam this step creates a bottom forming the base of the bag © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 29 place the lining inside the crocheted bag and sew around the perimeter i also sewed a zipper to the lining © tulip bag crochet by svetlana rogatykh 30 strap and loops loops tunisian knit stitch row 1 chain 7 insert your hook into the second chain from the hook and pull up a loop leave this loop on your hook continue down the chain for each stitch insert the hook yarn over pull up a loop leave the new loop on the hook yarn over pull through one loop yarn over pull through two loops repeat to last loop on hook the remaining loop on the hook will count as the first stitch in the next row row 2 insert the hook from front to back through the fabric between the two halves of the vertical loop yarn over and pull up a loop leave the new loop on the hook repeat for every stitch across the row yarn over pull through one loop yarn over pull through two loops repeat to last loop on hook repeat row 2 until desired length crochet single_crochet between the two halves of the vertical loop for every stitch across to finish thread the d-ring onto the tab and attach the tab with sl sts to the edge of the bag © tulip bag
